mapper.select: -- UsrDao.selectUsr SELECT A.USR_ID , A.USR_EMAIL , A.USR_PW , A.USR_NM , A.USR_AGE , A.USE_YN , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DTM,'%Y.%M.%D %H:%I:%S') AS REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.UPD_DTM,'%Y.%M.%D %H:%I:%S') AS UPD_DTM , A.UPD_USR_ID , B.FLANG_CD , B.MLANG_CD FROM TSYUR00010 A LEFT OUTER JOIN TSYUR00020 B ON A.USR_ID = B.USR_ID WHERE A.USR_ID = #{usrId} ORDER BY A.USR_ID
